alert.note: Alert for Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 10:09PM EDT until August 06 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in southwestern Indiana... Western Greene County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1009 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Linton, or 21 miles northeast of Vincennes, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Linton, Lyons, Newberry, Switz City and Bloomfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for southwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
